channel.title: [PI] Heros Legends [PI]
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://img190.imageshack.us/img190/5202/herov.gif[/img][/center] First of all, this source is going to be [PI] (Project Insanity) based. Now my previous development team didn't go as far as I wanted it to, but I've got better at coding and programming and know more then I used to. I also will be putting much effort into this server for I am going to dedicate myself more to this project, and will not slack off. [b]About the Server:[/b] My plans for this server is to be successful and stand out more then most of the other servers out there. And I have come up with some ideas to add into this game that may make it stick out more then most of the servers. For starters, this game will have a [b]storyline[/b] and a [b]introduction[/b]. Your basically going to wake up in a tragic incident were you find a letter and receive directions on finding your long lost friend (which wrote the letter) and make it back to safety (camp). You later find out that you are a hero, and have the power to cast magic and acquire the skill to battle with swords axes etc. This makes the player and other online players stick out more from the NPC'S and give the [b]custom[/b] storyline quests a different way to look upon. I know this may sound like fable a little bit, but it will differ greatly. I still need to think up a whole storyline, with the help of my development team of course. And do not worry, [b]PvP[/b] will have a big impact on the server as well as skilling. [b]Ideas to add in the game:[/b] [*] Custom Storyline [*] PvP Point Shop [*] Vote System [*] Castle Wars (Hero Wars, different rewards) [*] Custom Quests [*] Will try my best to add ALL SKILLS POSSIBLE [*] Webclient [*] Much More! [b]Spots Needed:[/b] [*] Server Coder: Acrodox [*] Server Coder: [*] Server Hoster: Asshole_rule [*] Client Coder: Acrodox [*] Gfx: Krackkid [*] Web Developer: [*] Webclient Creator: [*] Beta Tester: XxraidersxX [*] Beta Tester: First off, Here are some requirements. You must not act Childish, you must be active and contribute (for we do not accept or tolerate slackers), must be over 13, and have an MSN. Here is the layout: [b] If you are applying for hosting, please list why you would be able to offer 24/7 hosting and hold a good amount of layers online[/b]
[b] IRL Name [/b]: [b]Age[/b]: [b]MSN[/b]: [b]Spot I'm Applying for[b]: [b]Experience[/b]: [b]Do you have ventrilo?[/b]:
-Anthony MSN: antman97@ymail.com [hr] [b]PICTURES[/b] [IMG]http://i584.photobucket.com/albums/ss285/Nightmare97/qj-1.jpg[/img] Only picture i've got so far, I will be taking more. This is just a little piece of the letter you receive when you create a new character. This is kind of like a custom tutorial island which will eventually lead you to home/camp/edgeville. And this will also prevent spammers from spamming other places were all the players are at. Blacksmithing and Mining Zone [b]COMPLETE[/b]: [IMG]http://i584.photobucket.com/albums/ss285/Nightmare97/bsmith.jpg[/img] This area is just south of home. You can mine and blacksmith here. [hr] [size=18pt]HOSTER[/size] [quote="asshole_rule"]IRL Name : Nick Age: 14 MSN: r0cker_days@hotmail.com Spot I'm Applying for: hoster & server coder Experience: hosted 2 servers coded alot. Do you have ventrilo? No.[/quote] [hr] [size=18pt]BETA TESTER[/size] [quote="XxraidersxX"]IRL Name :waylon Age:15 MSN:waylon-slone@hotmail.com Spot I'm Applying for:beta tester Experience:i have been beta testing for 1 year now. Do you have ventrilo?:nope[/quote] [hr] [size=18pt]GFX[/size] [quote="krackkid"]IRL Name : Chris Age: 15 MSN: krackkid@live.com Spot I'm Applying for: GFX Experience: Erm do I really need to show you? Do you have ventrilo?: I can get.[/quote]

Age: 16

Spot I’m Applying for: In-Game Moderator, Web Developer or Beta Tester.
Experience:

In-Game Moderator
I have been a In-game moderator only 3 times as i usually am a donator by phone.

Beta Tester
I have beta tested lots of servers and i’m happy to beta test yours.

Web Developer
I can make you forums but i can’t get vBulliten unless you pay.

Do you have ventrilo?: No.[/quote]

So…in short…When you get moderator on servers…You donate for it? That’s pretty sad…
